title: Architecture and Representability
text: spec stable, testable representation user intent. Instead mutating already-mutated plot repeatedly, : keep base plot keep edit spec recompute preview via apply_studio_spec(base, spec) gives deterministic behavior cleaner code generation.

title: Architecture and Representability
text: ggplot2 rendering fully invertible screen pixels. Current design intentionally supports robust subset: coarse layer-level selection, per-point drag edits click mapping registry boxes + layer data bounds (Cartesian-first) labels selected theme fields layer alpha/size/linewidth/linetype Unsupported semantics left untouched documented rather guessed.
